title: LF 5v5 team
body:
I can play all roles
I’m currently in B1 but slowly getting out due to me not playing this account at the start of the season, had a family member play but currently in promos to silver
In recent season I was S1 playing with gold plat people
I can play all roles that need to be played
I’m also a great listener and a very fast learner
Currently just looking for a serious 5s team
Add me in game Hektik418
